com.example.cmput301f20t18

Class ExchangeTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cmput301f20t18.Transaction
      • com.example.cmput301f20t18.ExchangeTransaction

  • public class ExchangeTransaction
extends Transaction
    A ExchangeTransaction represents a transaction which allows users to hand the book between one another and is the result of the book owner accepting a request or the book borrower being done with the book and wanting to return it

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExchangeTransaction

        public ExchangeTransaction(java.lang.String bookOwner,
                           java.lang.String bookBorrower,
                           java.lang.Integer bookId,
                           java.lang.Integer ID,
                           java.lang.String status)
        ExchangeTransaction Constructor
        Parameters:
        bookOwner - The user who owns the book
        bookBorrower - The user who is borrowing the book
        bookId - The ID of the book being borrowed
        ID - The ID of the transaction
        status - The state the transaction is in (exchange)

    • Method Detail

      • scanned

        public void scanned(java.lang.String userWhoScanned)
        Used to set the state of bookOwnerScanned and bookBorrowerScanned to be called when a user scans the book during a hand off
        Parameters:
        userWhoScanned - The user who scanned the book

      • handOffReady

        public java.lang.Boolean handOffReady()
        Used to check if a hand off has taken place
        Returns:
        returns a boolean representing whether both users have acknowledged the book changing hands

      • handOff

        public BorrowTransaction handOff()
        Called after the owner of the book has given the book to the borrower authorised by both users scanning the book
        Returns:
        BorrowTransaction with same ID, bookOwner, bookBorrower and bookID

      • getLocation

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng getLocation()
        Gets the location where the hand off is taking place
        Returns:
        a LatLng object representing the location of the hand off

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng location)
        To be called from the SelectLocationActivity to set the location to the location chosen on the map
        Parameters:
        location - the location chosen on the map where the hand off will take place
